snippet: The safety agency said fires reported by owners of certain 2007 models might be traced to the power window master switch.
abstract: The safety agency said fires reported by owners of certain 2007 models might be traced to the power window master switch.

headline.main: N.H.T.S.A. to Investigate 830,000 Toyotas for Possible Fire Hazard
headline.print_headline: U.S. Auto Agency Investigates Fires In Toyota Doors
